keywords.value: Credit Ratings and Credit Rating Agencies
keywords.name: subject

byline.original: By MONICA DAVEY and MARY WILLIAMS WALSH
byline.contributor: Monica Davey reported from Chicago, and Mary Williams Walsh from Harrisburg, Pa.

lead_paragraph: A ruling against pension cuts and political divisions have made a dire situation worse for the state, as well as Chicago and its schools, which face shortfalls of their own.

headline.print_headline: Pensions and Politics Fuel Crisis in Illinois
headline.main: Pensions and Politics Fuel Crisis in Illinois

snippet: A ruling against pension cuts and political divisions have made a dire situation worse for the state, as well as Chicago and its schools, which face shortfalls of their own.
abstract: Mismanagement of pension system in Illinois is resulting in one of worst fiscal crises for any state in recent decades and could mean sharply higher taxes and cuts in spending.
